subtitle: Mood Tracker & Self Reflection
promotional_text: New: Personalized reflections, streak tracking, and iOS widgets. Understand yourself better, one entry at a time.
description:
Understand yourself better, one entry at a time.

InnerCycles is your personal space for daily journaling, mood tracking, and self-reflection. Discover patterns in your emotions, track your streaks, and grow with Personalized insights — all in a beautifully designed, private journaling experience.

Whether you journal every morning, track your moods throughout the day, or want to remember your dreams, InnerCycles adapts to your rhythm and helps you see the bigger picture of your inner life.

— DAILY JOURNALING —
• Write freely with guided prompts or open entries
• Track focus areas: energy, emotions, decisions, social life
• Build lasting streaks with gentle reminders
• Review monthly patterns and personal insights

— MOOD TRACKING —
• Log your mood in seconds with beautiful visual tracking
• Spot emotional patterns over days, weeks, and months
• Understand what influences how you feel

— DREAM JOURNAL —
• Record dreams before they fade
• Track recurring themes and symbols
• Build a searchable dream archive

— PERSONALIZED REFLECTIONS —
• Receive personalized insights based on your entries
• Discover connections you might have missed
• Gentle, private, and never judgmental

— MORE FEATURES —
• Birthday Agenda: Never forget important dates
• iOS Widgets: See your streak and prompts at a glance
• Apple Watch: Quick mood logging from your wrist
• Beautiful dark and light themes with pastel aesthetics
• Full privacy: your data, your control — private by default
• Available in English, Turkish, German, and French

— WHY INNERCYCLES? —
Unlike simple diary apps, InnerCycles uses pattern recognition to help you understand your cycles — emotional, creative, social, and personal. Past entries suggest trends. You notice what matters. Growth happens naturally.

Start your journaling practice today. Your future self will thank you.

— INNERCYCLES PREMIUM —
• Personalized reflections and insights
• Advanced pattern detection
• Unlimited entries and dream logs
• Monthly and annual reflection reports
• Ad-free experience

Subscriptions: Monthly or Annual plans available. Payment charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription auto-renews unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage subscriptions in Account Settings.
